interactions.prompt: Can you create a basic blog webpage for me that follows best practices, is simple and smart looking, and suitable for a professional geeky audience?

response.description: Created a clean, responsive blog template with modern styling

interactions.prompt: Thanks! That looks really good. Can you convert the html to pugjs?

response.description: Converted HTML template to Pug syntax

interactions.prompt: What is the keyboard shortcut to commit this message?
I tried that and it doesn't work
Can you convert styles.css to stylus please?
Can you add a pug template that would be for each article?

response.description: Created article template and added article-specific styles

interactions.prompt: Thanks, is there a way to add metadata to markdown files?
Can you make the front matter in example-post.md match the variables that you gave me earlier, please?

response.description: Updated frontmatter to match template variables

interactions.prompt: Please write a script that renders each file in the posts folder using the article.pug template

response.description: Created build script for processing markdown files

interactions.prompt: I get the error 'Error building posts: TypeError: marked is not a function' when I try to run the script
Can you create a gitignore file with all the right entries in it for this project?
Can you create a file called prompts.txt that summarises the prompts that I have given you in this session?
Actually, can you put the whole session in a json file, please?

response.description: Created JSON summary of entire session

interactions.prompt: Could the json file please contain just my prompts and your full responses?

response.description: Started creating detailed JSON with full conversation

interactions.prompt: Can I get something like this output myself from the editor? I'm using Cursor editor
Can you update prompts.txt and session.json with the latest prompts from this chat and keep the format of those files the same?

response.description: Updated both files with latest conversation
